headline: ISG Announces 2025 ISG Women in Digital Awards Winners for the Americas
summary: STAMFORD, Conn., September 05, 2025--Leaders with Verizon, Innova Solutions, Assurant, Blend Labs, Infosys and Nokia are winners of the 2025 ISG Women in Digital Awards for the Americas.

raw.headline: ISG Announces 2025 ISG Women in Digital Awards Winners for the Americas

headline: Verizon boosts shareholder payout, marking 19th consecutive year of dividend growth
summary: NEW YORK, Sept. 05, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Board of Directors at Verizon Communications Inc. (NYSE, Nasdaq: VZ) today declared a quarterly dividend of 69 cents per outstanding share, an increase of 1.25 cents per share from the previous quarter. The quarterly dividend is payable on November 3, 2025 to Verizon shareholders of record at the close of business on October 10, 2025. This 19th consecutive annual increase is a direct result of the company's disciplined financial management and unw

headline: YouTube star MrBeast reportedly wants to launch a phone company. Problem is, half of his core demographic doesn’t pay their own phone bills
summary: Roughly 73% of Gen Z’s phone bills are paid by their parents.
